verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>,

Ye know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> the feast of the passover <S%G3957><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed <S%G3860><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be crucified <S%G4717><s%> .

Then <S%G5119><s%> assembled together <S%G4863><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> the palace <S%G833><s%> of the high priest <S%G749><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was called <S%G3004><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%>,
And <S%G2532><s%> consulted <S%G4823><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might take <S%G2902><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by subtilty <S%G1388><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> him.

But <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%>, Not <S%G3361><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> day, lest <S%G3363><s%> there be <S%G1096><s%> an uproar <S%G2351><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.
¶ Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> the leper <S%G3015><s%>,

There came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> an alabaster box <S%G211><s%> of very precious <S%G927><s%> ointment <S%G3464><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> poured it <S%G2708><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%>, as he sat <S%G345><s%> at meat.

But <S%G1161><s%> when his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they had indignation <S%G23><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, To <S%G1519><s%> what purpose <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> waste <S%G684><s%>?
For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ointment <S%G3464><s%> might <S%G1410><s%> have been sold <S%G4097><s%> for much <S%G4183><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%>.

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> understood <S%G1097><s%> it, he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> trouble ye <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> ? for <S%G1063><s%> she hath wrought <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G1438><s%> ; but <S%G1161><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> .

For in that <S%G1063><s%> she <S%G3778><s%> <S%G846><s%> hath poured <S%G906><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ointment <S%G3464><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> , she did <S%G4160><s%> it for <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3165><s%> burial <S%G1779><s%> .

¶ Then <S%G5119><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve <S%G1427><s%>, called <S%G3004><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot <S%G2469><s%>, went <S%G4198><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%>,

And said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, What <S%G5101><s%> will ye <S%G2309><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, and <S%G2504><s%> I will deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> that time <S%G5119><s%> he sought <S%G2212><s%> opportunity <S%G2120><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

¶ Now <S%G1161><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> day of the feast of unleavened bread <S%G106><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Where <S%G4226><s%> wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> that we prepare <S%G2090><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>?

Now <S%G1161><s%> when the even <S%G3798><s%> was come <S%G1096><s%>, he sat down <S%G345><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> did eat <S%G2068><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> shall betray <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> they were exceeding <S%G4970><s%> sorrowful <S%G3076><s%>, and began <S%G756><s%> every one <S%G1538><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, is <S%G1510><s%> it <S%G3385><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>?

<S%G3303><s%> The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> goeth <S%G5217><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> unto that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed <S%G3860><s%> ! it had been <S%G2258><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> for that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G846><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he <S%G444><s%> had <S%G1080><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> been born <S%G1080><s%> .

¶ And <S%G1161><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> were eating <S%G2068><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> it, and brake <S%G2806><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> it to the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Take <S%G2983><s%> , eat <S%G5315><s%> ; this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> am risen again <S%G1453><s%> , I will go before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> .

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>.

¶ Then <S%G5119><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5564><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Gethsemane <S%G1068><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, Sit ye <S%G2523><s%> here <S%G847><s%> , while <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I go <S%G565><s%> and pray <S%G4336><s%> yonder <S%G1563><s%> .
